name: .WHACKER File Extension
summary: Learn about .WHACKER files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: To use a WHACKER file with Beat Saber for Quest, you must first use BMBF to install the Qosmetics mod. Then, connect your Quest to your PC and place your WHACKER file in the following directory:
The saber your WHACKER file contains will then appear in-game on the Custom Saber menu.
